mapper.select:
SELECT so_member_black.* FROM so_member_black WHERE 1=1
AND so_member_black.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND so_member_black.member_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memberId},'%')
AND so_member_black.member_black_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memberBlackId},'%')
AND so_member_black.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{createTime},'%')
AND so_member_black.cause LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cause},'%')
